name: Discord - Hide button for sending GIFs
description:
Hide button on the right side of chat input for sending GIFs.

Future versions might make it possible for you to turn off additional buttons.

For now you can see my other styles for hiding buttons:
Discord - Hide button for gifting Nitro v0.1 - https://userstyles.org/styles/226908/discord-hide-button-for-gifting-nitro-v0-1
Discord - Hide button for stickers v0.1 - https://userstyles.org/styles/226910/discord-hide-button-for-stickers-v0-1
additional_info:
24. jan 2022
v0.1 - Published version that hides "Open GIF picker" button in chats. Tested on Chromium on Windows desktop.
